HTML5 offers some great features like the canvas tag giving way to a plethora of animation options never thought possible. When IE9 was being released Microsoft Corp and  Parisian studio Steaw Web Design created ‘Never Mind The Bullets‘ a HTML5 parallax powered web comic.

In addition to the aforementioned canvas tag, ‘Never Mind The Bullets’ utilises Font face loading, 2D transform, Multi-Background and the audio tag. These techniques come together to create a great multimedia interactive narrative.
